+enum Foo { C { a: int, b: int } }
+struct C { a: int, b: int }         //~ ERROR error: duplicate definition of type `C`
+
+struct A { x: int }
+enum Bar { A { x: int } }           //~ ERROR error: duplicate definition of type `A`
+
+fn main() {}
